description:
Sora and Riku are back and must take the Mark of Mastery exam to become true Keyblade Masters and rescue the Sleeping Worlds. Meet new friends, enjoy the all-new "Flowmotion" battle system and experience a whole new adventure!

* Enjoy fast and effortless "Flowmotion" attacks!

* New Disney characters and worlds including "The Hunchback of Notre Dame" and "Tron Legacy" make their series debut!

* Introducing Dream Eaters: new enemies and your new friends!
name:
KINGDOM HEARTS 3D
[Dream Drop Distance]
